Container.Name: CKPool
Container.Overview:
Run your own SOLO Bitcoin mining pool.
Requires a Bitcoin address. It is strongly recommended to use a Coinbase receive address as the pool wallet.
Please review the following projects for configuration examples and background: - https://github.com/golden-guy/ckpool-solo - https://hub.docker.com/r/pinkyswear/ckpool-solo
This Unraid template supports custom IPs, ports, and Bitcoin node integration over RPC.
IMPORTANT REQUIREMENT: You MUST run a full Bitcoin Core node with the following settings enabled: - txindex=1 - prune=0
Example bitcoin.conf options required for ckpool operation: server=1 rpcuser=bitcoinrpc rpcpassword=yourstrongpassword rpcbind=0.0.0.0 rpcport=8332 rpcallowip=172.0.0.0/8 txindex=1 prune=0
Typical Bitcoin node data directory contents: .bitcoin -banlist.json -bitcoin.conf -bitcoind.pid -debug.log -fee_estimates.dat -mempool.dat -peers.dat -settings.json
CKPool container configuration directory contents: conf -ckpool.conf
An example ckpool.conf file can be found here: https://hub.docker.com/r/pinkyswear/ckpool-solo
This container connects to the Bitcoin Core node via RPC.
Special thanks to the following projects: https://bitbucket.org/ckolivas/ckpool-solo https://github.com/golden-guy/ckpool-solo
Container.Requires:
This container depends on a separate Docker container running a FULL Bitcoin Core node.
You must run Bitcoin Core with the following options enabled: txindex=1 prune=0
A Coinbase account may be required if using a Coinbase receive address as the pool wallet.
You must provide a valid Bitcoin address for mining rewards.
You are REQUIRED to create a valid ckpool.conf file for this container to start successfully.
Reference documentation: https://hub.docker.com/r/pinkyswear/ckpool-solo

Config.Name: Port 3333
Config.Description: Docker NAT port for miner connections

Config.Name: RPCUSER
Config.Description: RPC username (must match bitcoin.conf on the Bitcoin node)

Config.Name: RPCPASSWORD
Config.Description: RPC password (must match bitcoin.conf on the Bitcoin node)

Config.Name: RPCHOST
Config.Description: Hostname or IP address of the Bitcoin Core node (example: 172.20.0.10)

Config.Name: RPCPORT
Config.Description: RPC port of the Bitcoin Core node

Config.Name: COINBASE
Config.Description: Bitcoin address used to receive mining rewards

Config.Name: Logs
Config.Description: Directory where ckpool log files are stored
